mapper.select: SELECT ssa.*, ssav.id vid, ssav.sale_attr_value_name FROM `spu_sale_attr` ssa LEFT JOIN `spu_sale_attr_value` ssav ON ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id AND ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id WHERE ssa.spu_id = #{spuId};

SELECT ssa.*, ssav.id vid, ssav.sale_attr_value_name, IF(skuav.sale_attr_value_id IS NULL, '0', '1') is_checked FROM `spu_sale_attr` ssa LEFT JOIN `spu_sale_attr_value` ssav ON ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id AND ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skuav ON skuav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id AND skuav.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY ssa.base_sale_attr_id, ssav.id;

SELECT a.sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY a.sale_attr_value_id ASC SEPARATOR '|') value_json FROM (SELECT skuav.sku_id, skuav.sale_attr_value_id FROM `sku_sale_attr_value` skuav LEFT JOIN `spu_sale_attr_value` ssav ON skuav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id WHERE skuav.sku_id IN (SELECT id FROM `sku_info` WHERE spu_id = #{spuId}) ORDER BY skuav.sku_id, ssav.base_sale_attr_id, ssav.id) a GROUP BY a.sku_id;
